welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content: # DisTube A Discord.js module to simplify your music commands and play songs with audio filters on Discord without any API key. [DisTube Support Server](https://discord.gg/feaDd9h) - [Frequently Asked Questions](https://discord.gg/feaDd9h) ## Features - Based on `@discordjs/voice` - Easy to use and customize - Support YouTube and audio link - Audio filters (bassboost, nightcore, vaporwave,...) - Autoplay related songs - Plugin system to support more sites ([Plugin List](https://distube.js.org/#/docs/DisTube/stable/plugin/list)) ## Requirement - Node.js 16.9.0 or higher - [discord.js](https://discord.js.org) v14 - [@discordjs/voice](https://github.com/discordjs/voice) - [FFmpeg](https://www.ffmpeg.org/download.html) - [@discordjs/opus](https://github.com/discordjs/opus) - [sodium](https://www.npmjs.com/package/sodium) or [libsodium-wrappers](https://www.npmjs.com/package/libsodium-wrappers) ## Installation ```npm npm install distube@dev ``` ## Documentation Read DisTube's definitions, properties and events details in the [Documentation page](https://distube.js.org/). ## Example Bot - [DisTube Bot](https://skick.xyz/DisTube) - A music bot with reaction controller, filters, DJ mode, user's custom playlist and voting. - [DisTube Example](https://github.com/distubejs/example) - Example bot with simple command handler. - [DisTube Guide](https://distube.js.org/guide) - How to build a music bot from scratch. ## Dependencies - [node-ytdl-core](https://github.com/fent/node-ytdl-core): YouTube scraper ([DisTube Fork](https://github.com/distubejs/node-ytdl-core)) - [node-ytsr](https://github.com/TimeForANinja/node-ytsr): YouTube search scraper ([DisTube Fork](https://github.com/distubejs/ytsr)) - [node-ytpl](https://github.com/TimeForANinja/node-ytpl): YouTube playlist resolver ([DisTube Fork](https://github.com/distubejs/ytpl))

update.name: Updating to v4
update.content:
# Updating your code

v4 contains many new features, optimizations.\
Visit [the guide](https://distube.js.org/guide/additional-info/update.html) for help with updating your code from older versions.

list.name: Plugin List
list.content:
# Official Plugin

- [@distube/spotify](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/spotify): Spotify custom plugin.
- [@distube/soundcloud](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/soundcloud): SoundCloud extractor plugin.
- [@distube/yt-dlp](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/yt-dlp): yt-dlp extractor plugin for supporting 700+ sites.

dev.name: Plugin Development
dev.content:
# Plugin Development (WIP)

- Plugins will provide data to DisTube for handling and playing song without having to edit the DisTube files to support other sites.

## Extractor Plugin

- Example: [@distube/soundcloud](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/soundcloud)

## Custom Plugin

- Example: [@distube/spotify](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@distube/spotify)

construct.name: DisTube

methods.name: play
methods.description: Play / add a song or playlist from url. Search and play a song if it is not a valid url.

params.name: voiceChannel
params.description:
The channel will be joined if the bot isn't in any channels,
the bot will be moved to this channel if `options.move` is `true`

params.name: song
params.description:
URL | Search string |
{@link Song} | {@link SearchResult} | {@link Playlist}

methods.name: createCustomPlaylist
methods.description: Create a custom playlist

params.name: songs
params.description: Array of url, Song or SearchResult

methods.name: search
methods.description:
Search for a song. You can customize how user answers instead of send a number.
Then use {@link DisTube#play} to play it.

params.name: options.safeSearch
params.description: Whether or not use safe search (YouTube restricted mode)

methods.name: getQueue
methods.description: Get the guild queue

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: pause
methods.description: Pause the guild stream

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Resume the guild stream

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stop the guild stream

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: setVolume
methods.description: Set the guild stream's volume

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

params.name: percent
params.description: The percentage of volume you want to set

methods.name: skip
methods.description:
Skip the playing song if there is a next song in the queue.
<info>If {@link Queue#autoplay} is `true` and there is no up next song,
DisTube will add and play a related song.</info>

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

returns.description: The new Song will be played

methods.name: previous
methods.description: Play the previous song

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

returns.description: The new Song will be played

methods.name: shuffle
methods.description: Shuffle the guild queue songs

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: jump
methods.description:
Jump to the song number in the queue.
The next one is 1, 2,...
The previous one is -1, -2,...

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

returns.description: The new Song will be played

methods.name: setRepeatMode
methods.description:
Set the repeat mode of the guild queue.\
Toggle mode `(Disabled -> Song -> Queue -> Disabled ->...)` if `mode` is `undefined`

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: toggleAutoplay
methods.description: Toggle autoplay mode

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: addRelatedSong
methods.description: Add related song to the queue

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: seek
methods.description: Set the playing time to another position

params.name: guild
params.description: The type can be resolved to give a {@link Queue}

methods.name: emitError
methods.description: Emit error event

params.name: channel
params.description: Text channel where the error is encountered.

events.name: addList
events.description: Emitted after DisTube add a new playlist to the playing {@link Queue}.

events.name: addSong
events.description: Emitted after DisTube add a new song to the playing {@link Queue}.

events.name: empty
events.description:
Emitted when there is no user in the voice channel,
{@link DisTubeOptions}.leaveOnEmpty is `true` and there is a playing queue.

If there is no playing queue (stopped and {@link DisTubeOptions}.leaveOnStop is `false`),
it will leave the channel without emitting this event.
examples: distube.on("empty", queue => queue.textChannel.send("Channel is empty. Leaving the channel"))

events.name: error
events.description: Emitted when DisTube encounters an error while playing songs.

params.name: channel
params.description: Text channel where the error is encountered.

events.name: finish
events.description:
Emitted when there is no more song in the queue and {@link Queue#autoplay} is `false`.
DisTube will leave voice channel if {@link DisTubeOptions}.leaveOnFinish is `true`.
examples: distube.on("finish", queue => queue.textChannel.send("No more song in queue"));

events.name: initQueue
events.description: Emitted when DisTube initialize a queue to change queue default properties.

events.name: noRelated
events.description:
Emitted when {@link Queue#autoplay} is `true`, {@link Queue#songs} is empty,
and DisTube cannot find related songs to play.
examples: distube.on("noRelated", queue => queue.textChannel.send("Can't find related video to play."));

events.name: playSong
events.description:
Emitted when DisTube play a song.

If {@link DisTubeOptions}.emitNewSongOnly is `true`,
this event is not emitted when looping a song or next song is the previous one.

events.name: searchNoResult
events.description: Emitted when DisTube cannot find any results for the query.
examples: distube.on("searchNoResult", (message, query) => message.channel.send(`No result found for ${query}!`));

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: searchResult
events.description:
Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0,
and song param of {@link DisTube#play} is invalid url.
DisTube will wait for user's next message to choose a song manually.
<info>{@link https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/7354993|Safe search} is enabled
if {@link DisTubeOptions}.nsfw is disabled and the message's channel is not a nsfw channel.</info>

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: searchCancel
events.description:
Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0,
and the search canceled due to {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchTimeout}.
examples:
// DisTubeOptions.searchSongs > 0
distube.on("searchCancel", (message) => message.channel.send(`Searching canceled`));

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: searchInvalidAnswer
events.description:
Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0,
and the search canceled due to user's next message is not a number or out of results range.
examples:
// DisTubeOptions.searchSongs > 0
distube.on("searchInvalidAnswer", (message) => message.channel.send(`You answered an invalid number!`));

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: searchDone
events.description:
Emitted when {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.searchSongs} bigger than 0,
and after the user chose a search result to play.

params.name: message
params.description: The user message called play method

events.name: disconnect
events.description: Emitted when the bot is disconnected to a voice channel.

events.name: deleteQueue
events.description: Emitted when a {@link Queue} is deleted with any reasons.

events.name: finishSong
events.description: Emitted when DisTube finished a song.

Create a message collector for selecting search results.

Needed events: {@link DisTube#event:searchResult}, {@link DisTube#event:searchCancel},
{@link DisTube#event:searchInvalidAnswer}, {@link DisTube#event:searchDone}.

construct.description: Create a DisTubeStream to play with {@link DisTubeVoice}

methods.name: YouTube
methods.description: Create a stream from ytdl video formats

methods.name: DirectLink
methods.description: Create a stream from a stream url

classes.name: DisTubeVoice
classes.description: Create a voice connection to the voice channel

props.name: playbackDuration
props.description: Playback duration of the audio resource in seconds

props.name: voiceState
props.description: The voice state of this connection

methods.name: join
methods.description: Join a voice channel with this connection

methods.name: leave
methods.description: Leave the voice channel of this connection

params.name: error
params.description: Optional, an error to emit with 'error' event.

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stop the playing stream

params.name: force
params.description:
If true, will force the {@link DisTubeVoice#audioPlayer} to enter the Idle state
even if the {@link DisTubeVoice#audioResource} has silence padding frames.

methods.name: play
methods.description: Play a readable stream

methods.name: setSelfDeaf
methods.description: Self-deafens/undeafens the bot.

params.name: selfDeaf
params.description: Whether or not the bot should be self-deafened

returns.description: true if the voice state was successfully updated, otherwise false

methods.name: setSelfMute
methods.description: Self-mutes/unmutes the bot.

params.name: selfMute
params.description: Whether or not the bot should be self-muted

returns.description: true if the voice state was successfully updated, otherwise false

Get the stream url from {@link Song#url}. Returns {@link Song#url} by default.
Not needed if the plugin plays song from YouTube.

Not needed to add {@link Song#related} because it will be added with this function later.

construct.name: Queue
construct.description: Create a queue for the guild

props.name: volume
props.description: Get or set the stream volume. Default value: `50`.

props.name: songs
props.description: List of songs in the queue (The first one is the playing song)

props.name: _next
props.description: Whether or not the last song was skipped to next song.

props.name: _prev
props.description: Whether or not the last song was skipped to previous song.

props.name: playing
props.description: Whether or not the stream is currently playing.

props.name: paused
props.description: Whether or not the stream is currently paused.

props.name: repeatMode
props.description:
Type of repeat mode (`0` is disabled, `1` is repeating a song, `2` is repeating all the queue).
Default value: `0` (disabled)

props.name: autoplay
props.description:
Whether or not the autoplay mode is enabled.
Default value: `false`

props.name: beginTime
props.description: What time in the song to begin (in seconds).

props.name: textChannel
props.description: The text channel of the Queue. (Default: where the first command is called).

props.name: clientMember
props.description: The client user as a `GuildMember` of this queue's guild

props.name: filters
props.description: The filter manager of the queue

props.name: currentTime
props.description: What time in the song is playing (in seconds).

params.name: position
params.description: Position to add, <= 0 to add to the end of the queue

methods.name: pause
methods.description: Pause the guild stream

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Resume the guild stream

methods.name: setVolume
methods.description: Set the guild stream's volume

params.name: percent
params.description: The percentage of volume you want to set

methods.name: skip
methods.description:
Skip the playing song if there is a next song in the queue.
<info>If {@link Queue#autoplay} is `true` and there is no up next song,
DisTube will add and play a related song.</info>

methods.name: previous
methods.description: Play the previous song if exists

methods.name: shuffle
methods.description: Shuffle the queue's songs

methods.name: jump
methods.description:
Jump to the song position in the queue.
The next one is 1, 2,...
The previous one is -1, -2,...

returns.description: The new Song will be played

methods.name: setRepeatMode
methods.description:
Set the repeat mode of the guild queue.\
Toggle mode `(Disabled -> Song -> Queue -> Disabled ->...)` if `mode` is `undefined`

methods.name: seek
methods.description: Set the playing time to another position

methods.name: addRelatedSong
methods.description: Add a related song of the playing song to the queue

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stop the guild stream and delete the queue

methods.name: remove
methods.description:
Remove the queue from the manager
(This does not leave the voice channel even if {@link DisTubeOptions|DisTubeOptions.leaveOnStop} is enabled)

methods.name: toggleAutoplay
methods.description: Toggle autoplay mode

methods.name: emit
methods.description: Emit the {@link DisTube} of this base

methods.name: emitError
methods.description: Emit error event

params.name: channel
params.description: Text channel where the error is encountered.

classes.name: ISearchResult
classes.description: A abstract class representing a search result.

props.name: source
props.description: The source of the search result

classes.name: SearchResultVideo
classes.description: A class representing a video search result.

props.name: isLive
props.description: Indicates if the video is an active live.

props.name: source
props.description: The source of the search result

classes.name: SearchResultPlaylist
classes.description: A class representing a playlist search result.

props.name: source
props.description: The source of the search result

classes.name: Song
classes.description:
Class representing a song.

<info>If {@link Song} is added from a YouTube {@link SearchResult} or {@link Playlist},
some info will be missing to save your resources. It will be filled when emitting {@link DisTube#playSong} event.

Missing info: {@link Song#likes}, {@link Song#dislikes}, {@link Song#streamURL},
{@link Song#related}, {@link Song#chapters}, {@link Song#age_restricted}</info>

props.name: metadata
props.description: Optional metadata that can be used to identify the song. This is attached by the {@link DisTube#play} method.

props.name: formats
props.description: Stream formats (Available if the song is from YouTube and playing)

props.name: isLive
props.description: Indicates if the video is an active live.

props.name: streamURL
props.description: Stream / Download URL (Available if the song is playing)

props.name: age_restricted
props.description: Whether or not an age-restricted content

methods.name: _patchOther
methods.description: Patch data from other source

typedefs.name: Filter
typedefs.description:
An FFmpeg audio filter object
```
{
  name:  "bassboost",
  value: "bass=g=10"
}
```

typedefs.name: FilterResolvable
typedefs.description:
Data that resolves to give an FFmpeg audio filter. This can be:
- A name of a default filters or custom filters (`string`)
- A {@link Filter} object

props.name: emitNewSongOnly
props.description:
Whether or not emitting {@link DisTube#event:playSong} event
when looping a song or next song is the same as the previous one

props.name: leaveOnEmpty
props.description:
Whether or not leaving voice channel
if the voice channel is empty after {@link DisTubeOptions}.emptyCooldown seconds.

props.name: leaveOnFinish
props.description: Whether or not leaving voice channel when the queue ends.

props.name: leaveOnStop
props.description: Whether or not leaving voice channel after using {@link DisTube#stop} function.

props.name: savePreviousSongs
props.description:
Whether or not saving the previous songs of the queue
and enable {@link DisTube#previous} method

props.name: searchSongs
props.description:
Limit of search results emits in {@link DisTube#event:searchResult} event
when {@link DisTube#play} method executed. If `searchSongs <= 1`, play the first result

props.name: youtubeCookie
props.description:
YouTube cookies. Read how to get it in
{@link https://github.com/fent/node-ytdl-core/blob/997efdd5dd9063363f6ef668bb364e83970756e7/example/cookies.js#L6-L12|YTDL's Example}

props.name: youtubeIdentityToken
props.description:
If not given; ytdl-core will try to find it.
You can find this by going to a video's watch page; viewing the source; and searching for "ID_TOKEN".

props.name: customFilters
props.description:
Override {@link defaultFilters} or add more ffmpeg filters.
Example=`{ "Filter name"="Filter value"; "8d"="apulsator=hz=0.075" }`

props.name: searchCooldown
props.description: Built-in search cooldown in seconds (When searchSongs is bigger than 0)

props.name: emptyCooldown
props.description: Built-in leave on empty cooldown in seconds (When leaveOnEmpty is true)

props.name: nsfw
props.description:
Whether or not playing age-restricted content
and disabling safe search in non-NSFW channel.

props.name: emitAddListWhenCreatingQueue
props.description: Whether or not emitting `addList` event when creating a new Queue

props.name: emitAddSongWhenCreatingQueue
props.description: Whether or not emitting `addSong` event when creating a new Queue

props.name: joinNewVoiceChannel
props.description:
Whether or not joining the new voice channel
when using {@link DisTube#play} method

props.name: streamType
props.description:
Decide the {@link DisTubeStream#type} will be used
(Not the same as {@link DisTubeStream#type})

typedefs.name: GuildIdResolvable

params.name: options.textChannel
params.description: The default text channel of the queue

params.name: options.skip
params.description: Skip the playing song (if exists) and play the added playlist instantly

params.name: options.position
params.description:
Position of the song/playlist to add to the queue,
<= 0 to add to the end of the queue.

params.name: skip
params.description:
Skip the playing song (if exists) and play the added song/playlist if `position` is 1.
If `position` is defined and not equal to 1, it will skip to the next song instead of the added song

params.name: position
params.description:
Position of the song/playlist to add to the queue,
<= 0 to add to the end of the queue.

params.name: message
params.description: Called message (For built-in search events. If this is a {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/Falsy|falsy value}, it will play the first result instead)

params.name: metadata
member
params.description: A guild member creating the playlist

params.name: parallel
params.description: Whether or not fetch the songs in parallel

typedefs.name: RepeatMode
typedefs.description:
The repeat mode of a {@link Queue} (enum)
* `DISABLED` = 0
* `SONG` = 1
* `QUEUE` = 2

typedefs.name: PluginType
StreamType
typedefs.description:
Stream types:
* `OPUS` = `0` (Better quality, use more resources - **Recommended**)
* `RAW` = `1` (Better performance, use less resources)

typedefs.name: SearchResult
typedefs.description: A video or playlist search result
